name: LightRider (Bryophite)
description:
The Aurora Bore Threatens to bore the very Earth itself! Who could save us? The LightRider! Drive up the northern lights to defeat this foe and his many borelings! 

DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME IF YOU ARE SENSITIVE TO VIBRANT COLORS OR BRIGHT LIGHTS

WASD Steers the Bike

Mouse Aims and Fires
